goal.title: End poverty in all its forms everywhere

indicators.title: Material deprivation and severe material deprivation

goal.title: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture

indicators.title: Organic farming
Support for good governance in attaining appropriate nutrition globally
Nitrogen surplus in agriculture

goal.title: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages

indicators.title: Emissions of air pollutants
Premature mortality
Share of the population with excessive exposure to PM<sub>10</sub> in Germany
Obesity rate among adults
Smoking rate among adolescents and adults
Obesity rate among adolescents

goal.title: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all

indicators.title: 30 to 34-year-olds with a tertiary or post-secondary non-tertiary level of education
All-day care provision for children
Early school leavers (18 to 24-year-olds leaving school without graduation)

goal.title: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls

indicators.title: Vocational qualification of women and girls through German development assistance
Women in management positions in business
Gender pay gap

goal.title: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all

indicators.title: Phosphorous in flowing waters
Nitrate in groundwater
Development cooperation for drinking water and sanitation

goal.title: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all

indicators.title: Share of electricity from renewable energy sources in electricity consumption
Share of renewable energies in gross final energy consumption
Final energy productivity and primary energy consumption

goal.title: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all

indicators.title: Number of members of the Textiles Partnership
Gross fixed capital formation in relation to GDP
Gross domestic product per capita
Government debt
Raw material input productivity
Government deficit, structural deficit
Employment rate

goal.title: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation

indicators.title: Private and public expenditure on research and development

goal.title: Reduce inequality within and among countries

indicators.title: Gini coefficient of income distribution
Foreign school graduates

goal.title: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

indicators.title: Loss of open space area
Final energy consumption in goods transport
Housing cost overload
Density of settlements
Accessibility of medium-sized and large cities by public transport
Expansion of settlement and transport area
Final energy consumption in passenger transport

goal.title: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns

indicators.title: Energy consumption and CO<sub>2</sub> emissions from consumption
EMAS eco-management
Responsible procurement
Market share of products certified by publicly managed eco-labelling schemes

goal.title: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts

indicators.title: International climate finance for the reduction of greenhouse gases and adaptation to climate change
Greenhouse gas emissions

goal.title: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development

indicators.title: Proportion of sustainably fished stocks of fish in the North and the Baltic Sea
Nitrogen input to the North and the Baltic Sea through German inflows

goal.title: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

indicators.title: Preservation or restoration of forests in developing countries under the REDD+ rulebook
Eutrophication of ecosystems
Biodiversity and landscape quality

goal.title: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels

indicators.title: Criminal offences
Corruption Perceptions Index (CPI) in Germany and in partner countries of German development assistance
Number of projects to secure, register and destroy small arms and light weapons carried out by Germany in affected regions of the world

goal.title: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development

indicators.title: Expenditure for official development assistance as a proportion of gross national income
Number of students and researchers from developing countries and LDCs per year
Imports from least developed countries
